text:
Black Panther Becomes 1st Superhero Film To Get Best Picture Oscar Nomination & Fans Are Elated
Black Panther Becomes 1st Superhero Film To Get Best Picture Oscar Nomination & Fans Are Elated
Wakanda Forever!
When Black Panther had released last year, it was hailed as the best Marvel film ever made. The movie was considered a cultural touchstone for the way it stood for the race as well as identity. It was loved by audiences and critics alike.
Setting another record, Black Panther has done something no other superhero movie has ever done. The film has become the first superhero film to get best picture nomination at Oscars 2019. Black Panther has been nominated alongside BlacKkKlansman, Bohemian Rhapsody, A Star Is Born, Roma, The Favourite, Green Book, and Vice at the 91st Academy Awards nominations.
Twitter
And everyone is cheering!
Seven #OscarNoms for #BlackPanther, including best picture!! This is our reaction the first time we saw footage from the film and we're feeling this way all over again today! Thank you @TheAcademy! #WakandaForever #Oscars pic.twitter.com/lXWv3nsN90 — Lupita Nyong'o (@Lupita_Nyongo) January 22, 2019
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Black Panther has been nominated for 7 Academy Awards.
SEVEN. pic.twitter.com/DTf0IEljKh — [u.] (@ucheobidi) January 22, 2019
Black Panther got nominated for seven Oscars and I will literally never stop talking about that — 𝕛𝕒𝕫𝕞𝕚𝕟 (@joetreuse) January 23, 2019
BLACK PANTHER GOT SEVEN NOMINATIONS Y’ALL SMELL THE EXCELLENCE? THE POWER OF WAKANDA pic.twitter.com/wSBLal32zl — ⎊ deadpool fucker (@woIvern) January 22, 2019
black panther really did that, seven academy award nominations including best picture. black panther remains unrivalled and STAYS winning. pic.twitter.com/sqCLb4rjeO — cassian andor love bot (@soyaslut) January 22, 2019
#BlackPanther is nominated for SEVEN awards at this year’s #Oscars. It makes history as it becomes the first ever superhero film to be nominated for Best Picture at the awards ceremony. pic.twitter.com/7Bw7QDJUfb — Pop Crave (@PopCrave) January 22, 2019
I'm so excited about Black Panther getting SEVEN noms! If they don't take home AT LEAST Best Costume Design or Best Production Design I will RIOT. #AM2DM — MousieCore (@CoreMousie) January 22, 2019
Black Panther, a movie with an all black cast, a black director, a black costume designer is really nominated for SEVEN academy awards pic.twitter.com/DJL3eTcQdC — ‏ً (@SADISTlCNIK) January 22, 2019
Black Panther has earned seven nominations at the Oscars 2019. Apart from the Best Picture, the movie has also been nominated for Best Costume Design, Best Sound Mixing, Best Sound Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, and Best Original Song (for All The Stars).
